segments.text: Hello . This is Bell Canada . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . This is Amy Yang . I ’ m calling for a home phone cancellation . I ’ m moving out next month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . What day would you want your home phone cancelled ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . I ’ ll do it for you by then . Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1
